ComicInfo.Summary:
Winter's End Prologue/Epilogue: Prologue: Dejah Thoris has to put her world back in order after the big battle with Sabal Than. Epilogue: Dejah and John after John is released from the hypnotic trance Sabal had on him and the after effects.
Afterlife on Mars: A retrospect by Sabal Than and Baltas of the battle with Dejah.
Bound: John Carter adjusts to the low gravity of Barsoom.
Family Legend: Tars Tarkas and Sola battle a White Ape.
Young Dejah/Young Carter: A scene from early life of Dejah and John Carter being heroic.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-20 20:50:28. [CVDB845938] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 09:10:47. [Issue ID 2219602]
